data.name: Trajectory Conference 2020
data.description: At Trajectory Conference 2019, leading organizations shared about how they use feature management to build better software faster and with less risk. AWS, Slack, Atlassian, DataDog, HashiCorp, Seesaw, and others discussed their methodologies and best practices in detail. Watch these videos of the inâ€¦
